HOME.TITLE: zitadel
HOME.SECURITYANDPRIVACY_DESC: You can view the data in your Zitadel account and choose which activities are saved in order to personalize Zitadel for you
HOME.PROTECTION_DESC: Manage your organizational guidelines. Explore some pre-packaged solutions that save you time and ensure security.
HOME.PROJECTS_DESC: Authorize others to use your own projects or define custom roles on eligible projects
HOME.USERS_DESC: Monitor your role concept in real time. Take immediate action.
HOME.IAM_DESC: Add new organizations or elect managers to do it for you.

MENU.IAMADMIN: You are an IAM Administrator. Note that you have enhanced permissions!

USER.TITLE: Personal Information
USER.DESCRIPTION: Here you can manage your data as well as data protection and security settings in order to optimally adapt Caos to your needs

PAGES.TITLE: User
PAGES.DESCRIPTION: Here you can create new users or edit data that has already been entered.
PAGES.LOGINNAMESDESC: You can log into zitadel with these names

MFA.TITLE: Multifactor Authentication
MFA.DESCRIPTION: Add a second factor to ensure optimal security!
MFA.MANAGE_DESCRIPTION: Manage the second factor methods of the selected user!
MFA.OTP_DIALOG_DESCRIPTION: Scan the OTP code with an authenticator app and enter the code below!

CREATE.TITLE: Create User
CREATE.DESCRIPTION: Insert some information about the user below and submit!

PROFILE.TITLE: Profile
PROFILE.DESCRIPTION: Here you can manage your data as well as data protection and security settings in order to optimally adapt Zitadel to your needs

PASSWORD.TITLE: Password
PASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: Note that the possword must correspond to the policy your organization has set.
PASSWORD.MINLENGTHERROR: Password has to be at least {{value}} characters long

LOGINMETHODS.TITLE: Methods to access your identity
LOGINMETHODS.DESCRIPTION: This allows us to confirm your identity when you register or to contact you if suspicious activity is detected in your account

VALIDATION.INVALIDPATTERN: The password must consist of at least 8 characters and contain a capital letter, a special character and a number. The maximum length is 72.
VALIDATION.MINLENGTH: The password has to be at least {{requiredLength}} characters long!
VALIDATION.NOEMAIL: Username can not be an email
VALIDATION.SYMBOLERROR: The password must include a symbol!
VALIDATION.NUMBERERROR: The password must include a number!

TARGET.SELF: You will get users of your organization. If you want to add an external user
TARGET.EXTERNAL: To get users of your organization

USER.SIGNEDOUT: You are signed out. Click the button below to sign in again!

DETAIL.TITLE: Identity and Access Management
DETAIL.DESCRIPTION: This site is shows Zitadel Management preferences. You can make changes to views, elect managers and define global policies.

MEMBER.TITLE: Managers
MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: Managers can add and edit organizations and make changes to their corresponding projects and apps

VIEWS.TITLE: Views and Events
VIEWS.DESCRIPTION: This Card shows your Zitadel Views, you can clear them and remove failed events.

PAGES.LISTDESCRIPTION: Choose an organization for your new context
PAGES.ORGDETAIL_TITLE: Enter the name and domain of your new organization
PAGES.ORGDOMAIN_VERIFICATION: Provide your web domain and verify their ownership. You need to download a verification file and upload it at the provided URL listed below. To complete, click the button to verify.
PAGES.ORGDOMAIN_VERIFICATION_SKIP: You can skip verification for now and continue to create your organization, but in order to use your organization this step has to be completed!

DOMAINS.TITLE: Domains
DOMAINS.DESCRIPTION: Configure your domains on which your users will be registered.

MEMBER.TITLE: Organization Managers
MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: Define Accounts which can change your organizations preferences.

POLICY.TITLE: Explore Policies
POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Pre-packaged solutions that to ensure security of your data

PWD_COMPLEXITY.TITLE: Password Complexity
PWD_COMPLEXITY.DESCRIPTION: Ensures that all set passwords correspond to a specific pattern
PWD_COMPLEXITY.DESCRIPTIONCREATE: Ensures that all set passwords correspond to a specific pattern
PWD_COMPLEXITY.SYMBOLANDNUMBERERROR: The password must consist of a number and a symbol
PWD_COMPLEXITY.SYMBOLERROR: The password must include a symbol!
PWD_COMPLEXITY.NUMBERERROR: The password must include a number!
PWD_COMPLEXITY.PATTERNERROR: The required pattern is not fulfilled!

PWD_AGE.TITLE: Password Age
PWD_AGE.DESCRIPTION: You can set a max age property for passwords. This policy includes a warning after a specific time has elapsed
PWD_AGE.DESCRIPTIONCREATE: You can set a max age property for passwords. This policy includes a warning after a specific time has elapsed

PWD_LOCKOUT.TITLE: Password Lockout
PWD_LOCKOUT.DESCRIPTION: Password retries are infinite in default mode. You have to install this extention if you want to show retries or set a max try number.
PWD_LOCKOUT.DESCRIPTIONCREATE: Password retries are infinite in default mode. You have to install this extention if you want to show retries or set a max try number.

IAM_POLICY.TITLE: IAM Access Preferences
IAM_POLICY.DESCRIPTION: Define access properties of your users
IAM_POLICY.DESCRIPTIONCREATE: Emails as username is not allowed for enabled UserLoginMustBeDomain

ORG_DETAIL.TITLE: Organization
ORG_DETAIL.DESCRIPTION: Here you can edit your organization configuration and manage members

MEMBER.TITLE: Members
MEMBER.ADDDESCRIPTION: Enter the mail addresses of the users to be added!

PAGES.TITLE: Project
PAGES.DESCRIPTION: Here you can define applications, manage roles and grant other organizations to use your project
PAGES.LISTDESCRIPTION: Here you can find all projects you are allowed to view or perform actions on. If you can't find a project, contact a project owner or someone with the corresponding rights to gain project access.
PAGES.ZITADELPROJECT: This belongs to Zitadel project. If you change something, Zitadel may not behave as intended!

MEMBER.TITLE: Managers
MEMBER.TITLEDESC: Managers can make changes on this very entity, based on their given role in zitadel.
MEMBER.DESCRIPTION: Here you can find all managers of this project. You can add a new member and manage persisting ones.

GRANT.TITLE: Granted organizations
GRANT.DESCRIPTION: Allow an other organization to use your project

CREATE.TITLE: Create organization grant
CREATE.SEL_USERS: Select the users you wish to grant
CREATE.SEL_ROLES: Select the roles you want to be added to the grant
CREATE.SEL_ORG_DESC: Enter the complete domain to specify the organization to grant!
CREATE.ORG_DESCRIPTION: You are about to grant a user for the organization {{name}}
CREATE.ORG_DESCRIPTION_DESC: Switch the context in the header above to grant a user for another organization

DETAIL.TITLE: Managers of the granted organization
DETAIL.DESC: These are the Managers of the granted organization. You can select which users are allowed to maintain control of the project.

ROLE.TITLE: Roles
ROLE.DESCRIPTION: Define some roles which can be used to create project-grants
ROLE.NAME: Name
ROLE.ADDDESCRIPTION: Enter the data for the new role!
ROLE.EDITDESCRIPTION: Enter the new data for the role!
ROLE.SELECTGROUPTOOLTIP: Select all Roles of the group {{group}}

PAGES.TITLE: Application
PAGES.DESCRIPTION: Here you can edit your application data and its configuration

OIDC.TITLE: OIDC Configuration
OIDC.CLIENTSECRET_DESCRIPTION: Save your Client Secret as it will disappear once the dialog is closed!

PROJECT.TITLE: Authorizations
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: Define Authorizations for the specified project. Note that you can only see entries from projects and users where you are permitted to.

USER.TITLE: Authorizations
USER.DESCRIPTION: Define Authorizations for the specified user. Note that you can only see entries from projects and users where you are permitted to.

CREATE.TITLE: Create authorization
CREATE.DESCRIPTION: Search for the orgnanization, the project and the corresponding roles.

ORG.TITLE: Activity
ORG.DESCRIPTION: Here you can see the latest events that have affected an organization change

PROJECT.TITLE: Activity
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: Here you can see the latest events that have affected a projectchange

USER.TITLE: Activity
USER.DESCRIPTION: Here you can see the latest events that have affected a userchange
